welcome_message_body: Welcome to Saint-Jerome, where the beautiful natural surroundings and rich history await you. Take in the charm of our city, known for its stunning landscapes and vibrant cultural scene, and enjoy all that it has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mirabel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Mirabel Airport is one of the busiest in Canada, handling a large volume of freight and mail.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Hubert Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
